title: 110_hr3505
content: Securities Law Technical Corrections Act of 2007 - Makes technical corrections to the following Acts: (1) the Securities Act of 1933, (2) the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, (3) the Trust Indenture Act of 1939, (4) the Investment Company Act of 1940. And (5) the Investment Advisers Act of 1940. Amends the following statutes to make conforming amendments for the repeal of the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935: (1) the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, (2) the Trust Indenture Act of 1939, (3) the Investment Company Act of 1940, and (4) the Investment Advisers Act of 1940.
